metadata.title: CVE-2022-48835 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: mpt3sas: Page fault in reply q processingA page fault was encountered in mpt3sas on a LUN reset error path:[  145.763216] mpt3sas_base_sync_reply_irqs() using an invalid reply_qpointer outside of the list_for_each_entry() loop. At the end of the fulllist traversal the pointer is invalid.Move the _base_process_reply_queue() call inside of the loop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48835` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
